nodes.text: In 44 BBY, Xanatos owned a private office on the mining world of Bandomeer. To access the office, a code was needed. The code was "Crion", the name of Xanatos' deceased father.

Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn, Xanatos' former master, had reasons to believe Xanatos was causing trouble on the planet so he decided to find answers in his office. Taking a guess, he entered Crion as the code.
